Timeshyft was surprised at Jetfire's skill.

Timeshyft:
You're tough, Autobot, that I have to admit. But this makes the fame I'll 
gain by terminating you so much more greater!!

He fired 8 gauss slugs. Seeing the shots coming at him, he raised his 
shield. However, one of the lasers destroyed a car behind him, and it 
exploded, sending the decepticon flying forward, face down.


>From: Yanshosh@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: The terrorist
>Date: Sun, 26 Aug 2001 06:12:38 -0000
>
>::Jetfire::
>
>Jetfire barrel-rolls to the right, avoiding the shots heading for
>him. He speeds up, heading straight at Timeshyft, and then suddenly
>transforms, diving at him but ready to twist to avoid gunfire. While
>diving, he keeps firing from his wings, which were now on his back.
>
>
>--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Timeshyft, just after firing the eight ferrous iron from his gauss
>rifle,
> > reloaded his weapon. If he could just maul the autobot, and then go
>away,
> > the pain he would cause would be enough to satisfy him. That, on
>the other
> > hand, was easier said than done. Jetfire was renowned to be one of
>the
> > toughest of the Autobot warriors. Victory over him would also bring
>him
> > great glory among the Decepticon ranks.
